    <script type="text/javascript">
        var nbElem = document.getElementsByClassName('order_by_letter')[0].children.length;
        var indexSelected = 0;
        for (var i = 0; i < nbElem; i++) {
            console.log(document.getElementsByClassName('order_by_letter')[0].children[i].children[0].dataset.letter);
            if ('' == document.getElementsByClassName('order_by_letter')[0].children[i].children[0].dataset.letter) {
                indexSelected = i;
                break;
            }
        }
        document.getElementsByClassName('order_by_letter')[0].children[indexSelected].children[0].className = 'selected';
    </script>
</div>
</section>

    <div class="row">
    <div class="col-md-12">
        <small>

                    </small>
    </div>
</div>
        <script type="text/javascript">
        jQuery.get('/esi/3teasers', function (data) {
            jQuery('footer .container:first').append(data);
        });
    </script>
    <div class="divider filet"></div>
</div>

            jQuery.get('/esi/footer', function (data) {
                jQuery('#myFooter').html(data);
            });
        </script>
